Source code for code.libs.nano

#!/usr/bin/python
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

import os
if os.uname()[1] == 'raspberrypi':
    import serial



[docs]class Nano:
    """ Retorna dados do nano - Tacometro e Ultrassom
    """


[docs]    def __init__(self):
        """Construtor: Bota os m√©todos para funcionar.
        """

        self.ser = serial.Serial(port='/dev/ttyUSB1', baudrate=9600, timeout=1)

        self.wow = 0
        self.rpmD = 0
        self.rpmE = 0
        self.wowRaw = 0
        self.tempoVoo = 0
        self.distancia = 0
        self.distRef = 0



[docs]    def atualiza(self):
        """Atualiza a parada.
        """
        x = self.ser.readline().decode("utf-8")
        if(x != ""):
            x = x.replace("\r\n", "")
            x = x.replace(" ", "")
            y = x.split(",")
            if len(y) == 7:
                self.wow = y[0]
                self.rpmD = y[1]
                self.rpmE = y[2]
                self.wowRaw = y[3]
                self.tempoVoo = y[4]
                self.distancia = y[5]
                self.distRef = y[6]



[docs]    def getWow(self):
        return self.wow



[docs]    def getRpmD(self):
        return self.rpmD



[docs]    def getRpmE(self):
        return self.rpmE



[docs]    def getWowRaw(self):
        return self.wowRaw



[docs]    def getTempoVoo(self):
        return self.tempoVoo



[docs]    def getDistancia(self):
        return self.distancia



[docs]    def getDistRef(self):
        return self.distRef
